original_text: God's Laws that he gave to Moses could not make anything completely right. But now God has brought us something better to hope for. And in that way, we ourselves can come near to God.
korean_text: (율법은 아무 것도 온전하게 못할지라) 이에 더 좋은 소망이 생기니 이것으로 우리가 하나님께 가까이 가느니라

sentences.original_text: God's Laws that he gave to Moses
could not make anything completely right
sentences.korean_translation: 아무것도 완전히 옳게 만들 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: But now God has brought us
we ourselves can come near to God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 자신들이 하나님께 가까이 나아갈 수 있습니다
